meanings.definition: A yellow crystalline compound found in certain plants.
meanings.sent1: The xanthones in the plant give it a bright yellow color.
meanings.sent2: Scientists are studying the xanthones in these plants for their health benefits.
meanings.sent3: The xanthones decided to throw a party and turned the plant into a yellow disco ball.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as radiant as the yellow glow of xanthones in the plant.
meanings.sent5: The xanthones sparkled like tiny drops of sunshine in the plant.

meanings.definition: Any of a class of oxygen-containing heterocyclic compounds.
meanings.sent1: The xanthones are important compounds in organic chemistry.
meanings.sent2: Many fruits contain xanthones, which contribute to their antioxidant properties.
meanings.sent3: The xanthones gathered for a meeting to discuss their chemical bonds.
meanings.sent4: His ideas were as diverse and interconnected as the xanthones in the compound.
meanings.sent5: The xanthones danced around each other, forming intricate patterns in the compound.
